user_query: I'm planning to start a new business selling house plants online. Can you give me a list of house plants that are popular and highly sought after? It would be great if you could provide their ideal temperature, light requirements, and watering needs.

TaskList.description: Research and compile a list of popular house plants along with their specific care requirements.
Gather information on the ideal temperature for each of the popular house plants identified in step 1.
Find out the light requirements for each popular house plant identified in step 1.
Determine the watering needs for each of the popular house plants identified in step 1.
Compile all gathered information into a comprehensive list of house plants, including care details such as temperature, light, and watering needs.
